text: The 2015 season was Terengganu's 5th season in the Malaysia Super League, and their 20th consecutive season in the top-flight of Malaysian football. In addition, they were competing in the domestic tournaments, the Malaysia FA Cup and the Malaysia Cup Terengganu will announce their sponsors for the 2015 season as well as presenting the new kits on 18 January 2015. ==Club== === Current coaching staff === {| class="wikitable" |- !
